idea:

idea:
TravelPulse (TP) is a unique Safety, Security and Savings system for Cars and Commercial Vehicles. It is a vehicleâ€™s Virtual bodyguard when it comes to securing the Vehicle, ensuring safety of the people in it, and increasing savings on fuel  and maintenance cost.


TP captures various Driving Behaviour parameters, like speed, kilometres travelled, day/night travel, local/outstation travel, rash acceleration, harsh braking, engine/AC idling etc; collates them and transmits them to provide On-line feedback through Mobile App and Computer. In addition, the Driving Distraction parameters (under development) will capture the mobile usage (talking, texting, viewing) while driving. All this, would result in safer driving and lower accidents on our roads. These parameters will also facilitate introduction of Telematics Insurance in our country.

Another unique feature of TP is the Anti-theft mechanism for Prevention of theft and of remote immobilisation of vehicle, in case of theft; it is supported by Anti-towing mechanism also.


All this is achieved through a combination of a wired device, installed under the dashboard by our trained technicians, and a software with digitally connected system, which transmits live vehicle data to our server and the same data is shown to customers through our Mobile App and the computer system.
name: TRAVELPULSE VENTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Fuel @ Doorstep

There is a considerable demand of HSD for stationary equipment like generator ,sets, earth moving equipment, heavy machineries used in construction sites, mobile towers, etc. and these may not have facility / resource to store HSD. There is a demand from such customers for delivering HSD at their door steps. So this startup will be providing fuel at doorstep with the help of certified bowsers.
name: Viral FuelEnts

idea:
